ai-patthana14.34:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma ladies that are difficult for the living, etc.,
ai-patthana14.34:2.1_0: Experiential confidence in the teaching, and not based on the teaching cause.
ai-patthana14.34:3.1_0: Experiential confidence in the teaching, and there is no cause or condition for the sake of this.
ai-patthana14.34:4.1_0: ... five objects the results of the universal objects ...
